fnsb.macstransit.Activities.ActivityListeners

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • fnsb.macstransit.Activities.ActivityListeners.Helpers

  • public class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Spud on 2019-11-01 for the project: MACS Transit.

    For the license, view the file titled LICENSE at the root of the project.

    This class is full of static methods that are simply used as helper methods, and thus can be used anywhere.

    Since:
    Beta 7
    Version:
    1.1

    • Method Detail

      • getMarkerIcon

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.BitmapDescriptor getMarkerIcon(int color)
        Gets the color of the marker icon based off of the color value given. The reason why there needs to be a function for this is because there are only 10 colors that a marker icon can be.
        Parameters:
        color - The desired color value as an int.
        Returns:
        The BitmapDescriptor used for defining the color of a markers's icon.

      • loadAllStops

        public static BasicStop[] loadAllStops(Route[] routes)
        Loads all the stops from the provided routes.
        Parameters:
        routes - The routes to get the stops from.
        Returns:
        The full array of Stops in all the routes. This is a basic stop for now as there are no markers or circles associated with the stop yet.

      • addCircle

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle addCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CircleOptions options,
                                                                 java.lang.Object tag,
                                                                 boolean clickable)
        Helper function that adds a circle to the map with the provided options, and even sets the object this circle belongs to via its tag.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the circle to.
        options - The options to apply to the circle (position, color, size, etc...)
        tag - The class this circle will belong to.
        clickable - Whether or not this circle should be clickable.
        Returns:
        The generated circle.

      • addMarker

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 double latitude,
                                                                 double longitude,
                                                                 int color,
                                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                                 java.lang.Object tag)
        Helper function that adds a marker to the map at the provided location, with the provided title, and sets the color to the provided color.

        The marker can also be assigned a class that it belongs to via the tag argument.

        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the marker to.
        latitude - The latitude of the marker.
        longitude - The longitude of the marker.
        color - The color of the marker.
        title - The title of the marker.
        tag - The object that this maker belongs to.
        Returns:
        The generated marker.

      • generateTimeString

        public static java.lang.String generateTimeString(org.json.JSONArray stopArray,
                                                  int count,
                                                  java.lang.String expectedArrivalString,
                                                  java.lang.String expectedDepartureString,
                                                  boolean is24Hour,
                                                  Route[] routes,
                                                  boolean includeRouteName)
                                           throws org.json.JSONException
        Helper function that formats a string containing the arrival and departure times that is to be used in the body section of a stop info window.
        Parameters:
        stopArray - The JSONArray containing the times to be formatted.
        count - The number of stops to parse the time for.
        expectedArrivalString - The expected arrival place holder string.
        expectedDepartureString - THe expected departure placeholder string.
        is24Hour - Whether or not the user is using 24 hour time or not.
        routes - The routes that correspond to the times that need to be parsed.
        includeRouteName - Whether or not to include the route name in the final string corresponding to the times.
        Returns:
        The formatted time string (to be used in the body section of an info window).
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - Thrown if there are any exceptions when parsing the JSONObjects.

      • getTime

        public static java.lang.String getTime(org.json.JSONObject json,
                                       java.lang.String tag)
        Helper function that returns the time (in 24-hour form) that is found in the provided JSONObject via a regex.
        Parameters:
        json - The JSONObject to search.
        tag - The tag in the JSONObject to search.
        Returns:
        The time (in 24-hour form) as a String that was found in the JSONObject. This may be null if no such string was able to be found, or if there was a JSONException.

      • formatTime

        public static java.lang.String formatTime(java.lang.String time)
        Helper function that returns the time from 24-hour time to 12-hour time (and even includes AM and PM).
        Parameters:
        time - The time to format as a string.
        Returns:
        The formatted 12-hour time. This may return the original 12 hour time if there was an exception parsing the time.

      • findStopInSharedStop

        public static Stop findStopInSharedStop(SharedStop sharedStop)
        Helper function that finds the stop within a shared stop based on the route in common.
        Parameters:
        sharedStop - The shared stop to look through.
        Returns:
        The stop that is contained within the shared stop, or null if none exists.

      • getCharacterOccurrence

        public static int getCharacterOccurrence(char character,
                                         java.lang.String string)
        Helper function that determines the number of times a given character occurs within a given string.
        Parameters:
        character - The character to get the number of occurrences of.
        string - The string to check.
        Returns:
        The number of times that character occurs within the given within the given string.

      • createSettingsPopupCheckbox

        public static android.widget.CheckBox createSettingsPopupCheckbox(android.view.View view,
                                                                  int id,
                                                                  boolean checked,
                                                                  android.widget.Button button,
                                                                  SettingsPopupWindow settingsPopupWindow,
                                                                  java.lang.String tag)
        Creates a checkbox for the settings popup window. This also sets up a listener for when the checkbox is checked to update the apply button value based on the checkboxes changed value.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to get the checkbox from.
        id - The id of the check box.
        checked - Whether or not the checkbox should be checked by default.
        button - The apply button for the settings popup window.
        settingsPopupWindow - The settings popup window class.
        Returns:
        The newly created checkbox.

      • createPolyLine

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Polyline createPolyLine(Route route,
                                                                        com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map)
        Helper function that creates the polyline for the specified route.
        Parameters:
        route - The route that the polyline corresponds to.
        map - The map that will have the polyline added to.
        Returns:
        The polyline (already added to the map, and set to be visible).
